title: Delete Accounts
body: I never used this account and will never use it so please disable it and take it off the accounts im using for the email please

replies.body: We can definitely get accounts deleted when requested, but we need to do those types of things in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Reach out to us there, and we can get that started for you!
